astral-sh/uv

Fast Python package manager written in Rust

Related repos

  • Python type checker written in Rust by Astral
  • Python linter and code formatter, written in Rust
  • Python 3 interpreter built in Rust, runs on WebAssembly, embeddable in Rust apps
  • Turns Python repositories into uv environments
  • Terminal file manager, written in Rust, uses async I/O
  • Rust bindings for Python, build native modules or run Python from Rust
  • async Python web framework powered by Rust runtime
  • fast Rust code editor with Vim mode, plugins, remote dev, and built-in terminal
